name: CREATIVE RESPONSIBLE INTEGRATED SYSTEMS FOUNDATION
briefDescription: CriSys Foundation is a pioneering software & IT services company, established by a team of visionary technologists, to utilize technology to create a more connected, responsible and abundant society.100% of the profits from our technology services are utilised for social and nation-building projects, such as rehabilitation of tribals and other marginalised populations in India. Furthermore, our beneficiaries are trained to operate our intelligent development platforms, providing valuable job oppertunities and empowering them to help earn the funds required for their development.The CriSys Foundation team includes dedicated professionals from a variety of socio-technical disciplines such as Medical Science, Life Sciences, Horticulture, Biotechnology, Sustainable Development, Public Administration and Management working together to create integrated solutions to solve issues at the root. None of our Directors or Management take any salary or profit for the full-time contribution of their valuable time, expertise and efforts.
